name: Swirl Protocol
description: What is the project about? Lending platform native to Layer2 chains such as Linea and Base. Swirl aims to be the prime lending platform on Linea by offering highest competitive incentives for money markets, having the deepest liquidity and being native to Linea. What makes your project unique? Tokenomics that incentivizes providing liquidity with gauge weight voting History of your project. Built in May 2023 and launched on Linea mainnet in July 2023 Whatâ€™s next for your project? Tokenomics DAO proposal. More chain expansions. What can your token be used for? Staking to get veToken, which can be used to vote and accumulate revenue. Revenues will be distributed based on your share of staked SWI supply.
